text: You can open the SNUFF-BOX at the end of any combat that you won. You cannot open it after fleeing from a combat, nor at any other time. When you open it, each player rolls one die. On a roll of 1 or 2, the player loses 1D6 ENDURANCE. On a roll of 3 to 6, the player gains 1D6 ENDURANCE. The SNUFF-BOX then shuts itself and cannot be used again until you win another battle.
